attributes.action: Ban teaching of hetrosexual litreture to homosexual infants
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As per another petition demanding the removal of non-heterosexual literature for heterosexual children as this may influence, please remove all heterosexual teaching from homosexual children as this may influence and cause a great deal of harm - This petition is not being funny but as the opposite example has been published I expect this one to as well

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
